sorts

Class SortDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorts.SortDriver

  • public class SortDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    SortDriver is the class that runs all the sorts. It is split into 2 sections. The first section demonstrate that the various sorts work. The second section is for gathering the time data for ever sort complete. There are 75 total time data runs.
    Author:
    Wesley Chan

      Constructor and Description
      SortDriver()
